author: Pat Leahy
title: Coronavirus: People must stay at home, with limited exceptions, until Easter Sunday
description: People are told not to walk more than 2km from their homes
content:
The Government has announced further sweeping restrictions on social and commercial life tonight as it struggles to contain the spread of the coronavirus.
From midnight tonight, the country is on lockdown, with people told to stay in their homes with only a … [+3363 chars]
